sn22.128:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahakotthiko baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye …pe…
sn22.128:1.2: ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn22.128:2.1: “Idhavuso, sutava ariyasavako samudayadhammam rupam ‘samudayadhammam rupan’ti yathabhutam pajanati; vayadhammam rupam …pe… samudayavayadhammam rupam ‘samudayavayadhammam rupan’ti yathabhutam pajanati;
sn22.128:2.4: samudayadhamme sankhare … vayadhamme sankhare … samudayavayadhamme sankhare ‘samudayavayadhamma sankhara’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
sn22.128:2.5: Samudayadhammam vinnanam … vayadhammam vinnanam … samudayavayadhammam vinnanam ‘samudayavayadhammam vinnanan’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
